name: Sterling Media
tag_list: film-marketing-company, public-relations-firm, ethnic-marketing, public-relations-for-celebrities, corporate-brand-management, international-marketing-firm, promotional-advertising-company, social-marketing-campaigns
overview:
Sterling Media is the best entertainment public relations firm located in the United Kingdom that has have access to esoteric circles and prominent business crowd within the country and also abroad. The international marketing firm that has been around for almost 2 decades now catering to an international audience.

Sterling Media, a UK based company are experts in providing entertainment PR services. They have been very instrumental in successful worldwide launches of several films, Life of Pi being the recent one. The company has all it takes to manage your brand.

offices.address1: Sterling House, 20-21 Astwood Mews, Kensington, London, SW7 4DE

milestones.description: International Media Entrepreneur Award at the Asian Who’s Who Awards 2011
milestones.source_description: Natasha Mudhar of Sterling Media Wins Entrepreneur Award

external_links.title: Best Public Relations Firm for International Celebrities
